entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
